messages.subject: Listserv suggestion
messages.msgSnippet: A suggestion to speed up downloading of listserv posts: Take include original message in reply OFF your email system. Some of these posts are getting pages
messages.messageBody:
A suggestion to speed up downloading of listserv posts:

Take "include original message in reply" OFF your email system.

Some of these posts are getting pages long with replies to replies
to replies to replies .... (well you get the idea). As long
as the topic is still relevant to the post, I think most of
us have memories long enough to recall the gist of the
original post and/or thread. Or at least just cut and paste
the pertinent passages instead of the entire original message.

Just a thought.

Rich S
